page.title: 16VIEWS ON SCHOOLS - PRIMARY
page.content: WHEN QUESTIONED,THE MAJORITY OF PRIMARY SCHOOL CHILDREN,ESPECIALLY THE INFANTS (5-7 YEARS) REPLIED THAT THEY LIKED SCHOOL AND THOUGHT THAT THEY OUGHT TO ATTEND,OTHERWISE THEY WOULD NOT LEARN ANYTHING. MOST CHILDREN THOUGHT THAT A SCHOOL UNIFORM WAS NEEDED BECAUSE IT WAS NEAT AND TIDY AND THE WHOLE SCHOOL SHOULD LOOK SMART. ABOUT HALF THOSE CHILDREN WHO STAYED FOR SCHOOL DINNERS ENJOYED THEM,THE OTHERS THOUGHT THAT SANDWICHES WERE A GOOD IDEA. ALMOST EVERYBODY AGREED THAT HOMEWORK FOR PRIMARY CHILDREN WAS NOT NEEDED AS THEY WORKED HARD ENOUGH AT SCHOOL.
